marklogic.body: An article in the Strib today had a few lines about Burnett and that he did himself no favor by yielding a run yesterday, then printed his ERA (yikes it's bad).Â So, I conclude he's in trouble.Â Gray, who yesterday was mentioned to be the competition with Burnett,Â hurt himself badly today.Â I don't know why Casey Fein wasn't mentioned to be in the running for a Spot.Â I also read that there will likely 8 relief pitchers going North--but that could be because only 4 SPs are--Baker is likely to be on the DL and Marquis on leave.
